00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122         public function get_countries()
00123         {
00124                 $query = "SELECT id, name FROM countries";
00125         $result = self::$db->query($query);
00126         while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00127                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00128                         //$this->_countries[$key][] = $value;
00129                                 $this->_countries[$key][$row['id']] = $value;
00130         mysqli_free_result($result);
00131 
00132         return $this->_countries;
00133         }

00335         public function get_has_many($x_field, $y_field)
00336         {
00337                 if($y_field == NULL)
00338                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field];
00339                 else
00340                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field];
00341         }
00342 
00343 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345         public function init_has_many($x_field, $y_field)
00346         {
00347                 if($y_field == NULL)
00348                 {
00349                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field] = array();
00350                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field], "0");
00351                 }
00352                 else
00353                 {
00354                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field] = array();
00355                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field], "0");
00356                 }
00357 
00358                 //echo "INIT HAS MANY: " . $x_field . "<br>";
00359         }

00361 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370         public function get_resource($resource_id) {
00371                 $query = "SELECT * FROM observatories WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
00372         $result = self::$db->query($query);
00373         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00374                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00375         mysqli_free_result($result);
00376 
00377                 //OBSERVATORIES TABLE
00378                 foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00379                 {
00380                         //check if value is 0 since we use INT in the DB
00381                         if($value != '0')
00382                         {
00383                                 if($key == 'latitude')
00384                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00385                                 elseif($key == 'longitude')
00386                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00387                                 else
00388                                         $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = stripslashes($value);
00389                         }
00390                         else
00391                                 $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = '';
00392                 }
00393 
00394                 //SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00395                 $query = "SELECT id, name, email, institution FROM scientific_contacts, observatory_to_scientific_contacts " .
00396                 "WHERE scientific_contacts.id=observatory_to_scientific_contacts.scientific_contact_id " .
00397                 "AND observatory_to_scientific_contacts.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00398                 //DEBUG:
00399                 //echo $query;
00400                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00401                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00402                 {
00403                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00404                         {
00405                                 if ($key == 'id')
00406                                         $this->_hasMany["scientific_contacts"][] = $value;
00407                                 else
00408                                         $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_$key"][] = stripslashes($value);
00409                         }
00410                 }
00411                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00412 
00413                 //HIDDENFIELDS
00414                 $query = "SELECT * FROM hidden_fields WHERE hidden_fields.id=" . $resource_id;
00415                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00416                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00418                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00419                 {
00420                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00421                         if($key != 'id')
00422                                 $this->_hiddenFields[$key] = $value;
00423                 }
00424                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00425 
00426                 //RESEARCH AREAS
00427                 $query = "SELECT research_area_id as research_areas FROM observatory_to_research_areas " .
00428                 "WHERE observatory_to_research_areas.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00429                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00430                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00431                 {
00432                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00433                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00434                 }
00435                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00436 
00437                 //TARGETS
00438                 $query = "SELECT target_id as targets FROM observatory_to_targets " .
00439                 "WHERE observatory_to_targets.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00440                 //DEBUG:
00441                 //echo $query;
00442                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00443                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00444                 {
00445                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00446                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00447 
00448                 }
00449                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00450 
00451                 //TELESCOPES
00452                 //SIMILAR QUERY TO SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00453                 $query = "SELECT * FROM telescopes, observatory_to_telescopes " .
00454                 "WHERE telescopes.id=observatory_to_telescopes.telescope_id " .
00455                 "AND observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00456                 //echo "TESTING INSTRUMENT QUERY: " . $query . "<br>";
00457 
00458                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00459 
00460                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00461                 {
00462                         //for each telescope of the requested obervatory
00463                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00464                         {
00466                                 if($value != '0')
00467                                 {
00468                                         if($key == 'id')
00469                                         {
00470                                                 //save telescope id in telescopes
00471                                                 //DEBUG
00472                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "<br>";
00473                                                 $this->_hasMany["telescopes"][] = $value;
00474                                                 //$this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value] = array();
00475 
00476                                                 //get all instruments for current telescope
00477                                                 $query_1 = "SELECT * FROM instruments, telescope_to_instruments " .
00478                                                 "WHERE instruments.id=telescope_to_instruments.instrument_id " .
00479                                                 "AND telescope_to_instruments.telescope_id=" . $value;
00480 
00481                                                 //DEBUG
00482                                                 //echo $query_1 . "<br>";
00483 
00484                                                 $result_1 = self::$db->query($query_1);
00485                                                 while($row_1 = mysqli_fetch_array($result_1, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00486                                                 {
00487                                                         //for each instrument of the requested telescopes
00488                                                         foreach($row_1 as $i_key => $i_value)
00489                                                         {
00491                                                                 if($i_value != '0')
00492                                                                 {
00493                                                                         if($i_key == 'id')
00494                                                                         {
00495                                                                                 //DEBUG
00496                                                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "=> INSTRUMENT ID: " . $i_value . "<br>";
00497                                                                                 $this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value][] = $i_value;
00498                                                                         }
00499                                                                         else
00500                                                                                 $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = stripslashes($i_value);
00501 
00502                                                                         //echo $i_key . ": ";
00503                                                                         //echo $i_value . "<br>";
00504                                                                 }
00505                                                                 else
00506                                                                         $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = '';
00507                                                         }
00508                                                 }
00509                                                 mysqli_free_result($result_1);
00510                                         }
00511                                         else
00512                                                 $this->_telescopes[$key][] = stripslashes($value);
00513                                 }
00514                                 else
00515                                         $this->_telescopes[$key][] = '';
00516                         }
00517                 }
00518                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00519 
00520                 //ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
00521                 $query = "SELECT * FROM additional_information WHERE additional_information.id=" . $resource_id;
00522                 //DEBUG:
00523                 //echo $query;
00524                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00525                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00526                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00527                 {
00528                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00529                         if($key != 'id')
00530                                 $this->_additionalInformation[$key] = stripslashes($value);
00531                 }
00532                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00533 
00534         }

00545         public function add_resource() {
00546                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00547         $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00548                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
00549                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
00550                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
00551                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
00552 
00553         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
00554                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
00555                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
00556                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
00557                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
00558 
00559                 $query = "INSERT INTO observatories (" .
00560                         "`id`,`name`,`founded`,`institution`,`web_address`,`address`,`zip_code`," .
00561                         "`city`,`country_id`,`phone`,`email`,`latitude`,`longitude`,`approx_position`," .
00562                         "`sealevel_m`,`precipitation`,`clear_nights`,`timezone`," .
00563                         "`observatory_status`," .
00564                         "`partner_observatories`, `creation_date`)" .
00565                         "VALUES (NULL,'" .
00566                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_name"]) . "','" .
00567                 $_POST["add_obs_founded"] . "','" .
00568                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "','" .
00569                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "','" .
00570                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "','" .
00571                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "','" .
00572                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "','" .
00573                 $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "','" .
00574                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "','" .
00575                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "','" .
00576                 addslashes($latitude_float) . "','" .
00577                 addslashes($longitude_float) . "','" .
00578                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "','" .
00579                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "','" .
00580                 $_POST["add_obs_precip_id"] . "','" .
00581                 $_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"] . "','" .
00582                 $_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"] . "','" .
00583                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "','" .
00584                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
00585                 "NOW())";
00586 
00587                 self::$db->query($query);
00588                 $status = array("errno" => $this_->_link->errno(),
00589                         "error" => self::$db->error(),
00590                         "res_id" => self::$db->getLastInsertId());
00591 
00592                 return $status;
00593         }

00606         public function update_resource($res_id) {
00607                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00608                 $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00609                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
00610                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
00611                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
00612                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
00613 
00614         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
00615                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
00616                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
00617                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
00618                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
00619 
00620                 $query = "UPDATE observatories SET " .
00621                         //We get another POST VAR for the name if EDIT
00622                         "name='" . addslashes($_POST["update_obs_name"]) . "'," .
00623                         "founded='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_founded"]) . "'," .
00624                         "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "'," .
00625                         "web_address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "'," .
00626                         "address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "'," .
00627                         "zip_code='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "'," .
00628                         "city='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "'," .
00629                         "country_id='" . $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "'," .
00630                         "phone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "'," .
00631                         "email='" .addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "'," .
00632                         "latitude='" . addslashes($latitude_float) . "'," .
00633                         "longitude='" . addslashes($longitude_float) . "'," .
00634                         "approx_position='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "'," .
00635                         "sealevel_m='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "'," .
00636                         "precipitation='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_precip_id"]) . "'," .
00637                         "clear_nights='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"]) . "'," .
00638                         "timezone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"]) . "'," .
00639                         "observatory_status='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "'," .
00640                         "partner_observatories='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
00641                         "modification_date=NOW() " .
00642                         "WHERE id=" . $res_id;
00643                 
00644                 self::$db->query($query);
00645                 $status = array("errno" => self::$db->errno(),
00646                         "error" => self::$db->error(),
00647                         "res_id" => $res_id);
00648 
00649                 return $status;
00650         }

00652 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00663         public function add_obs_keys($res_id, $action)
00664         {
00665                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00666                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_scientific_contacts & scientific_contacts)
00667                 //called VIA EDIT
00668                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
00669                         $this->update_sci_cons($res_id);
00670             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00671                 $this->add_sci_cons($res_id);
00672 
00673                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00674                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (hidden_fields)
00675                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
00676                 $this->update_hidden_fields($res_id);
00677             //called VIA ADD
00678             if ($action == "Add Entry")
00679                 $this->add_hidden_fields($res_id);
00680 
00681             //------------------------------------------------------------
00682             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_research_areas & research_areas)
00683             //called via EDIT
00684             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00685                 $this->delete_res_areas($res_id);
00686             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00687             $this->add_res_areas($res_id);
00688 
00689             //------------------------------------------------------------
00690             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_targets)
00691             //called via EDIT
00692             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00693                 $this->delete_targets($res_id);
00694             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00695             $this->add_targets($res_id);
00696 
00697                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00698             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatories_to_telescopes & telescopes)
00699             //called via EDIT
00700             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00701                         $this->delete_telescopes($res_id);
00702                 //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00703                 $this->add_telescopes($res_id);
00704 
00705             //------------------------------------------------------------
00706             //ADD/UPD/DEL (additional_information)
00707                 //called via EDIT
00708             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00709                 $this->update_add_info($res_id);
00710             //called VIA ADD
00711             if ($action == "Add Entry")
00712                 $this->add_add_info($res_id);
00713         }
00714 
00715 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00726         protected function update_sci_cons($res_id)
00727         {
00728                 $query = "DELETE FROM observatory_to_scientific_contacts WHERE " .
00729                        "observatory_id=" . $res_id;
00730             self::$db->query($query);
00731 
00732                 //PROOF IF THERE IS AN ARRAY!
00733                 if(is_array($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"]))
00734                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"] as $key => $sci_con_id)
00735                         {
00736                                 // check if a name is written in the line
00737                                 if ($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_name"][$key] != "")
00738                                 {
00739 
00740                                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_scientific_contacts VALUES (" . $res_id .
00741                                         "," . $sci_con_id . ")";
00742 
00743                                         self::$db->query($query);
00744                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00745                                                 print "<H4>Error updating observatory_to_scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00746                                         else
00747                                         {
00748                                                 $query = "UPDATE scientific_contacts SET " .
00749                                                 "name='". addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "'," .
00750                                                 "email='" . addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "'," .
00751                                                 "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "' " .
00752                                                 "WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
00753 
00754                                                 //DEBUG:
00755                                                 //echo $query;
00756 
00757                                                 self::$db->query($query);
00758                                                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00759                                                 print "<H4>Error updating scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00760                                         }
00761                                 }
00762                                 else //DELETE empty row scientific contacts
00763                                 {
00764                                         $query = "DELETE FROM scientific_contacts WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
00765                                         self::$db->query($query);
00766                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00767                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00768                                 }
00769                         }
00770         }
00771

00784         {
00785                 //echo "DEBUG: SciConCount: " . count($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"]) . LF;
00786             foreach($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"] as $key => $name)
00787                 {
00788                         // check if a name is written in the line
00789                         if ($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key] != "")
00790                         {
00791                         $query = "INSERT INTO scientific_contacts VALUES (NULL,'" .
00792                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "','" .
00793                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "','" .
00794                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "')";
00795 
00796                     self::$db->query($query);
00797                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00798                                   print "<H4>Error inserting scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00799 
00800                             $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_scientific_contacts VALUES (" . $res_id .
00801                                      "," . self::$db->getLastInsertId() . ")";
00802 
00803                             self::$db->query($query);
00804                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00805                                   print "<H4>Error inserting observatory_to_scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00806                         }
00807                 }
00808         }

00889 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00900    protected function add_res_areas($res_id)
00901    {
00902                 //adding new areas
00903                 if(isset($_POST["add_res_are"]))
00904                 {
00905                         //DEBUG:
00906                         //echo "TESTING: " . $_POST["add_res_are"][1] . "<br>";
00907 
00908                         foreach($_POST["add_res_are"] as $new_res_are)
00909                         {
00910                                 //insert new area in research_areas
00912                                 $query = "INSERT INTO research_areas (" .
00913                                 "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
00914                                 addslashes($new_res_are) . "')";
00915 
00916                                 //DEBUG:
00917                                 //echo "TESTING QUERY: " . $query . "<br>";
00918 
00919                                 self::$db->query($query);
00920                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00921                                 print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in research_areas!</H4>" . LF;
00922 
00923                                 //push new id into add_obs_res_are_ids
00924                                 array_push($_POST["add_obs_res_are_ids"], self::$db->getLastInsertId());
00925                         }
00926                 }
00927 
00928                 foreach ($_POST["add_obs_res_are_ids"] as $res_are_id)
00929             {
00930                         //check if res id is not empty and 100000 (other)
00931                 if(($res_are_id != '') && ($res_are_id != 100000))
00932                 {
00933                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_research_areas VALUES (" . $res_id .
00934                         "," . $res_are_id . ")";
00935 
00936                         //DEBUG:
00937                         //echo "TESTING: " . $query . "<br>";
00938 
00939                         self::$db->query($query);
00940                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
00941                                 print "<H4>Error inserting in observatory_to_research_areas!</H4>" . LF;
00942                 }
00943             }
00944    }

00985                                 {

00987                                         "," . $target_id . ")";
00988

00990                                 //echo "TESTING: " . $query . "<br>";

00995                                 }
00996                 }
00997    }

00999 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01012         protected function delete_telescopes($res_id)
01013         {
01014                 //Telescopes
01015                 //PROOF IF THERE IS AN ARRAY!
01016                 if(isset($_POST["add_obs_telescope_ids"]))
01017                         //foreach ($_POST["add_obs_instrument_ids"] as $instrument_id)
01018                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_telescope_ids"] as $tele_key => $telescope_id)
01019                         {
01020                                 //check if an telescope type is choosen
01021                                 if (!empty($telescope_id))
01022                                 {
01023                                         //Instruments
01024                                         $query = "DELETE FROM instruments WHERE id IN (" .
01025                                                 "SELECT instrument_id from telescope_to_instruments WHERE telescope_id=" . $telescope_id .")";
01026 
01027                                         //DEBUG:
01028                                         //echo "INSTRUMENTS TABLE DELETE: " . $query . "<br>";
01029 
01030                                         self::$db->query($query);
01031                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01032                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01033 
01034                                         //Telescopes
01035                                         $query = "DELETE FROM telescopes WHERE id=" . $telescope_id;
01036 
01037                                         //DEBUG:
01038                                         //echo "TELESCOPES TABLE DELETE: " . $query . "<br>";
01039 
01040                                         self::$db->query($query);
01041                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01042                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01043                                 }
01044                         }
01045         }
01046 
01047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01061         protected function add_telescopes($res_id)
01062         {
01063                 //Telescopes
01064             foreach($_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"] as $tele_key => $tele_type_id)
01065                 {
01066                         //check if an telescope type is choosen
01067                         if (!empty($tele_type_id))
01068                         {
01069                                 //new Telescope Type (only one!)
01070                                 if(!empty($_POST["add_telescope_type"][$tele_key]))
01071                                 {
01072                                         $query = "INSERT INTO telescope_types (" .
01073                                         "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01074                                 addslashes($_POST["add_telescope_type"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01075 
01076                                 //DEBUG:
01077                                 //echo "TELESCOPE TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01078 
01079                                 self::$db->query($query);
01080                                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01081                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in telescope_types!</H4>" . LF;
01082 
01083                                 //overwrite POST var with new telescope type id
01084                                 $_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"][$tele_key] = self::$db->getLastInsertId();
01085                                 }
01086 
01087                                 //new Antenna Type (only one!)
01088                                 if(!empty($_POST["add_antenna_type"][$tele_key]))
01089                                 {
01090                                         $query = "INSERT INTO antenna_types (" .
01091                                         "`id`,`antenna_type`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01092                                 addslashes($_POST["add_antenna_type"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01093 
01094                                 //DEBUG:
01095                                 //echo "ANTENNA TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01096 
01097                                 self::$db->query($query);
01098                                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01099                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in antenna_types!</H4>" . LF;
01100 
01101                                 //overwrite POST var with new antenna type id
01102                                 $_POST["add_obs_antenna_type_id"][$tele_key] = self::$db->getLastInsertId();
01103                                 }
01104 
01105                                 //insert new telescope
01106                                 $query = "INSERT INTO telescopes VALUES (NULL,'" .
01107                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_telescope_name"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01108                        $_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01109                        $_POST["add_obs_telescope_elements"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01110                        $_POST["add_obs_diameter"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01111                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_focallength"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01112                        $_POST["add_obs_antenna_type_id"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01113                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_wavelength"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01114                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_b"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01115                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_b_unit"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01116                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_e"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01117                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_e_unit"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01118                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_telescope_comments"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01119 
01120                                 //DEBUG:
01121                                 //echo "TELESCOPES TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01122 
01123                     self::$db->query($query);
01124                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01125                                 print "<H4>Error inserting telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01126 
01127                                 //save telescope id for inserting instruments later
01128                                 $telescope_id = self::$db->getLastInsertId();
01129 
01130                             $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_telescopes VALUES (" . $res_id .
01131                                         "," . $telescope_id . ")";
01132 
01133                             //DEBUG:
01134                             //echo "OBSERVATORY_TO_TELESCOPES TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01135 
01136                             self::$db->query($query);
01137                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01138                                 print "<H4>Error inserting observatory_to_telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01139 
01140                             //Instruments
01141                             foreach($_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key] as $instr_key => $instr_type_id)
01142                             {
01143                                 //DEBUG:
01144                                 //echo "INSTRUMENT TYPE ID: " . $instr_type_id . "<br>";
01145                                 //check if an instrument type is choosen
01146                                 if(!empty($instr_type_id))
01147                                 {
01148                                         //new Instrument Type (only one!)
01149                                         if(!empty($_POST["add_instrument_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]))
01150                                         {
01151                                                         $query = "INSERT INTO instrument_types (" .
01152                                                         "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01153                                                 addslashes($_POST["add_instrument_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "')";
01154 
01155                                                 //DEBUG:
01156                                                 //echo "INSTRUMENT TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01157 
01158                                                 self::$db->query($query);
01159                                                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01160                                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in instrument_types!</H4>" . LF;
01161 
01162                                                 //overwrite POST var with new instrument type id
01163                                                 $_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key][$instr_key] = self::$db->getLastInsertId();
01164                                         }
01165 
01166                                         //insert new instrument to telescope
01167                                         $query = "INSERT INTO instruments VALUES (NULL,'" .
01168                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_name"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01169                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01170                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_focal_position"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01171                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01172                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_b"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01173                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_b_unit"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01174                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_e"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01175                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_e_unit"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01176                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_spatial_resolution"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01177                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_spectral_resolution"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01178                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_polarisation"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01179                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_field_of_view"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01180                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_max_frames"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01181                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_frame_size"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01182                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_max_exposure"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01183                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_min_exposure"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01184                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_bw_chip"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01185                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_chip_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01186                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_comments"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "')";
01187 
01188                                                 //DEBUG:
01189                                                 //echo "INSTRUMENTS TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01190 
01191                                 self::$db->query($query);
01192                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01193                                                 print "<H4>Error inserting instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01194 
01195                                                 $query = "INSERT INTO telescope_to_instruments VALUES (" . $telescope_id .
01196                                                 "," . self::$db->getLastInsertId() . ")";
01197 
01198                                                 //DEBUG:
01199                                         //echo "TELESCOPE_TO_INSTRUMENTS TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01200 
01201                                         self::$db->query($query);
01202                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01203                                                 print "<H4>Error inserting telescope_to_instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01204                                 }
01205                             }
01206 
01207                         }
01208                 }
01209         }

01231                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_backend_desc"]) . "','" .
01232                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_research_com"]) . "','" .
01233                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_gen_com"]) . "')";
01234

01238         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)

01259                         "instrument_comments='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_inst_com"]) . "'," .

01262                         "backend_description='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_backend_desc"]) . "'," .
01263                         "research_comments='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_research_com"]) . "'," .
01264                         "general_comments='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_gen_com"]) . "'" .
01265                                 " WHERE id=" . $res_id;
01266 
01267                 //DEBUG:
01268                 //echo "UPDATE info: " . $query . "<br>";
01269                 self::$db->query($query);
01270                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01271                         print "<H4>Error updating additional information!</H4>" . LF;
01272         }

01274 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01275 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01276 // HELPER METHODS
01281         protected function gpsToFloat($prefix ,$degree, $minutes, $seconds, $cent)
01282         {
01283                 $float = 0.0;
01284 
01285         $float = abs($degree) + abs($minutes / 60) + abs($seconds / (60 * 60)) + abs($cent / (60 * 60 * 100));
01286 
01287                 if ($prefix == 'North')
01288                         $float *= 1;
01289                 else if ($prefix == 'South')
01290                         $float *= -1;
01291                 else if ($prefix == 'East')
01292                         $float *= 1;
01293                 else if ($prefix == 'West')
01294                         $float *= -1;
01297                 //echo "gpsToFloat-DEBUG: " . $prefix . " , " . $degree . LF;
01298                 //echo "Float: " . $float . LF;
01299 
01300         return $float;
01301         }
01302 
01303 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01308         protected function floatToGps($LATorLON, $float)
01309         {
01310                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["float"] = $float;
01311 
01312                 if ($LATorLON == "latitude")
01313                 {
01314                         if($float < 0)
01315                         $prefix = "South";
01316                 else
01317                         $prefix = "North";
01318         }
01319                 else if ($LATorLON == "longitude")
01320                 {
01321                         if($float < 0)
01322                         $prefix = "West";
01323                 else
01324                         $prefix = "East";
01325                 }
01326                 else
01327                 {
01328                         //$_POST["add_obs_" . $LATorLON] = array();
01330                 }
01331 
01332                 //echo "DEBUG-DB-float:" . $float;
01333 
01334         $float = abs($float);
01335         $deg = floor($float);
01336         $min = floor(($float - $deg) * 60);
01337         $sec = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60)) * 60 * 60 );
01338         $cent = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60) - ($sec/(60 * 60))) * 60 * 60 * 100 );
01339 
01340                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] = $deg;
01341                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["minutes"] = $min;
01342                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["seconds"] = $sec;
01343                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["cent"] = $cent;
01344                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["prefix"] = $prefix;
01345 
01346                 //DEBUG:
01347                 //echo "TESTING: " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] . "<br>";
01348 
01349                 //DEBUG:
01350                 //echo $LATorLON . "-floatToGps()-DEGUG: Float" . $float . LF;
